text: Giuseppe Ciarrapico (28 January 1934 â€“ 14 April 2019) was an Italian businessman, sports official and politician. He was president of the football club AS Roma from 1991 and 1993. He also served as a Senator for Silvio Berlusconi's The People of Freedom party from 2008 to 2013. He was born in Rome, Lazio. Ciarrapico died on 14 April 2019 in Rome. He was 85. ==References== Category:1934 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Italian businesspeople Category:Politicians from Rome
title: Giuseppe Ciarrapico
